name: 3rd Edition of International Conference on Materials Science And Engineering
content: It is with great pleasure that we announce our forthcoming congress “3rd Edition of International Conference on Materials Science and Engineering” (MAT 2022) which will be taking place at Paris, France and can be attended virtually during September 21-22, 2022 which will move forward with the theme “Inquisition of Material Science for Better Perspective.” To meet the current age industrial revolution, there is a tremendous need to improve understanding about state-of-the-art breakthroughs in materials science and engineering, the integration of new materials with existing material processing processes, and modern production support technologies. This scientific gathering has a goal to bring together people from various backgrounds, promote cross-pollination between diverse research domains, and expose and discuss cutting-edge theories, frameworks, techniques, tools, and applications. It is dedicated to providing a forum for exchanging the most recent research findings as well as sharing generous research methods. The experts and industry partners in attendance will give a terrific networking opportunity. The conference will feature keynote presentations and special talks by recognised specialists from prestigious regional and international institutes. Over the course of two days, internationally recognised speakers will discuss how their research has evolved in response to current difficulties, including inspirational lessons in material science and innovation.
